column4: hi all, I'm using Hardy, kernel 2.6.24-23, just upgraded the latest ATI driver, version 9.1, and my suspend/hibernate function doesn't work anymore, I'm on Thinkpad T60, with ATI Mobility X1300, anyone has any idea or info on my issue? :-)
